summary: Adds roads to the new homes that are added in Hearthfire.
descriptionHtml:
This mod will add three roads which will connect from the new homes that are added in Hearthfire and connect to a city or main road. This way you can easily travel to your home and not have to wander through the wilderness to reach your home. If you are using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5739/?]World Map - Skyrim Hold Borders [/url]we do have a patch with the mod that will add the new roads on the world map. You can download that optional if you wish. Also check out my[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65533/?] Skyrim Riften Eastern Road[/url]. If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/786?]here[/url]. If you play Oblivion also check out my [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/38386]Oblivion Cheydinhal Northern Road[/url] and my [url=http://oblivion.nexusmods.com/mods/38385]Oblivion Leyawiin Northern Road[/url].

There is a patch that requires [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5739/?]World Map - Skyrim Hold Borders [/url]and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76240?]Rowboats[/url] that will fix the roads on the world map so they all appear. You can download it [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76242?]here[/url].

Requirements
Skyrim
Hearthfire
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5739/?]World Map - Skyrim Hold Borders [/url](Optional)

To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin into your data folder. If your installing the World Map - Skyrim Hold Borders Patch then open the compressed folder and choose the type of borders line your using which are either New, Classic or Simplified. Then copy the dds file from the folder and paste it into Data/Textures\Terrain\Tamriel folder replacing the the other dds files.
author: LegoManIAm94

files.name: World Map - Skyrim Hold Borders Patch
